text: was a Japanese politician. He was Prime Minister of Japan from 1980 to 1982. Suzuki died at a hospital in Tokyo of pneumonia on 19 July 2004 at the age of 93. ==References== Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:1911 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Politicians from Iwate Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Chief Cabinet Secretaries of Japan
